title: Medical Definition of Aromatherapy
author: Medical Editor Charles Patrick Davis; MD; PhD

The mechanism of action in [aromatherapy](https://www.rxlist.com/script/main/art.asp?articlekey=15655) is unknown, but recent studies have shown that aromatherapy may be beneficial for some [health](https://www.rxlist.com/script/main/art.asp?articlekey=3663) problems.
